https://tmrev.io/movie/50358-Bruce Springsteen: The Promise – The Making of Darkness on the Edge of Town 2022-11-27
xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/50358-Bruce Springsteen: The Promise – The Making of Darkness on the Edge of Town 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wG4qC2nqIWN8rL3FrYWdCK8lRNC.jpg The ninety-minute film combines never-before-seen footage of Springsteen and the E Street Band shot between 1976 and 1978—including home rehearsals and studio sessions — with new interviews with Springsteen, E Street Band members, manager Jon Landau, former-manager Mike Appel, and others closely involved in the making of the record. Bruce Springsteen: The Promise – The Making of Darkness on the Edge of Town
